name: 3d Taxi car driver Parking simulator free games
name_original: 3d Taxi car driver Parking simulator free games
description:
Texi Parking

Taxi Texi parking Game..
Taxi Parking has realistic and challenging parking situations.
You must be a fan of the driving games.
Try to become a taxi driver in one of the best taxi simulator.
Race your car through the big city traffic, pick up passengers and drive them safely to their destinations.
You can driving around the big city, suburbs, construction sites, parks and even the beach.
It's crazy how the city lives - people are walking, cars are crossing. Get in your taxi, fasten your seat belts and become a city traffic racer.

key features:

HD Graphics

Full 3D large environment

Simulator driving smooth controls
